mapper.select: select flt_cd, flt_sect, flt_nm, flt_mtt, prc_cd, FN_GET_PRC_CD_TO_NM(prc_cd) as prcNm, cmt, seq from adm_flt_cd where use_yn = 'Y'
select flt_cd, flt_sect, flt_nm, flt_mtt, prc_cd, nvl(FN_GET_PRC_CD_TO_NM(prc_cd),'해당사항없음') as prcNm, cmt, seq from adm_flt_cd order by seq
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adm_flt_cd (flt_cd, flt_sect, flt_nm, flt_mtt, prc_cd, cmt, seq ) VALUES( FN_MAKE_FLTCD(), #{fltSect}, #{fltNm}, #{fltMtt}, #{prcCd}, #{cmt}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(seq),0)+1 FROM adm_flt_cd) )
mapper.update: update adm_flt_cd set flt_sect = #{fltSect}, flt_nm = #{fltNm}, flt_mtt = #{fltMtt}, cmt = #{cmt}, prc_cd = #{prcCd}, seq = #{seq} where flt_cd = #{fltCd}
